synopsis.text: In the heart of a bustling city, amidst the chaos of an underground boxing arena, a young fighter named Mignon discovers an unexpected sanctuary in the company of a mysterious doctor, Oh Young-One. Orphaned at a young age, Mignon's life is a relentless cycle of working as a mechanic by day and battling in the ring by night under the watchful eye of his ruthless coach. Amidst this tumultuous existence, the tender care of the enigmatic doctor offers Mignon a glimmer of hope and solace. However, when Mignon stumbles upon Young-One's hidden truth - that he is a vampire - their burgeoning relationship takes a dramatic turn. Despite the danger and Young-One's warnings to stay away, Mignon remains steadfast in his refusal to abandon the one person who has shown him kindness and made him feel valued. Their passionate and complex bond unfolds in this captivating South Korean BL anime, filled with drama, desire, and the thrill of the fight.
